snippet: Donald J. Trump accepted the Republican presidential nomination with an unusually vehement appeal to Americans who feel that their country is spiraling out of control....
abstract: Donald John Trump accepts Republican Party's nomination for president at party convention in Cleveland; vehemently delivers acceptance speech rife with dark imagery, depicting United States as humiliated nation that can only be saved by his presidency.

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY and JONATHAN MARTIN

lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump accepted the Republican presidential nomination with an unusually vehement appeal to Americans who feel that their country is spiraling out of control.

headline.main: His Tone Dark, Donald Trump Takes G.O.P. Mantle
headline.print_headline: Trump, as Nominee, Vows: ‘I Am Your Voice’
